revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Silver |image = [[File:Mt Silver.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt Silver |tokens = 10,000 |location = On the west end of Route 28 }} '''Mt Silver''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]] and is 6x6 in size (36 tiles in total), containing 6 chests, 15 non-boss encounters, 1 Boss encounter and 14 empty tiles.
== Dungeon Stats ==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 130,500 |- | Boss || 440,000 |}
== Pokémon ==
Following is the list of all the pokémon that you can find in this [[Dungeons|dungeon]].
* Ponyta * Doduo * Tangela * Sneasel * Ursaring * Donphan * Teddiursa * Phanpy * Quagsire * Misdreavus * Larvitar (boss)
== Items ==
You can find these items when you open a chest in this [[dungeons|dungeon]].
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]

{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Silver |image = [[File:Mt Silver.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt Silver |tokens = 10,000 |location = On the west end of Route 28 }} '''Mt Silver''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]] and is 6x6 in size (36 tiles in total), containing 6 chests, 15 non-boss encounters, 1 Boss encounter and 14 empty tiles.
